overview:
Melissa is Vice President of Product at AdMobius, where she is responsible for product strategy, product management, user experience and product marketing.

Previously, she held the title of VP Product at Velti, focused on defining and bringing to market the next generation of advertising products. Prior to Velti, Melissa was Senior Director, Product Management at Yahoo!, where she focused on ensuring Yahoo! had a pipeline of innovative advertising solutions to create sustainable growth. Also while at Yahoo!, she led product management for the suite of display ad serving products as well as worked in search marketing and local monetization. Preceding her work in the digital advertising industry, Melissa spent over a decade working on storage management and enterprise software solutions in market research, product marketing and product management roles at both established and startup companies including VERITAS, Infogenesis, Invio, and Replicus. She received a B.A. in Economics from University of California, Santa Barbara and a MBA from the University of Southern California.
